name: MLS_OVERRIDE_REL_TIME_HX
description: Stores 'related' information for override for multiline sig

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MLS_OVRIDE_REL_DAYS
columns.description: Contains a list of days that are used to override the frequency specified for the order along with the times in ORD-34636.

columns.name: MLS_OVRIDE_REL_TM
columns.description: Contains a list of times that are used to override the frequency specified for the order along with the days in ORD-34635.
